name: Double Draw
desc:
[ Skill Activation ]
Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.

[ Effect ]
At the start of your Draw Phase, you can activate this Skill. Draw 2 cards instead of 1 for your normal draw during this Draw Phase. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.

name: Pain and Gain
desc:
[ Skill Activation ]
Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.

[ Effect ]
When this Skill is activated, Special Summon all your "Gouki" monsters that were destroyed by battle this turn. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.

name: Trickstar Trick
desc:
[ Skill Activation ]
Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.

[ Effect ]
Activate this Skill during your opponent's turn. When this Skill is activated, discard 1 "Trickstar" card to make your opponent draw until they have 3 cards in their hand. During the End Phase of the turn this Skill was activated, your opponent must banish cards from their hand equal to the number of "Trickstar" monsters in your GY (or their entire hand, if the number is less than or equal to the number of "Trickstar" monsters in your GY). This Skill can only be used once per Duel.

name: Burning Draw (Skill)
desc:
[ Skill Activation ]
Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.

[ Effect ]
When this Skill is activated, your LP become 100, then you draw 1 card for every 1000LP lost by this effect. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.

name: Minus Mitosis
desc:
[ Skill Activation ]
Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.

[ Effect ]
Activate this Skill when a Link Monster(s) is Special Summoned from the GY. When this Skill is activated, halve your opponent's LP and the ATK of 1 face-up monster they control. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.

name: Malevolent Malpractice
desc:
[ Skill Activation ]
Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.

[ Effect ]
When this Skill is activated, banish 2 Level 2 or lower monsters from your GY with the same name; Special Summon 2 monsters with the same name from your Deck with Levels equal to the Levels of monsters banished by this effect. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.

name: Double Bite
desc:
[ Skill Activation ]
Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.

[ Effect ]
When this Skill is activated, choose 1 Insect monster you control. It can attack twice during each Battle Phase while face-up on the field. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.

name: Dinowrestle Revolution
desc:
[ Skill Activation ]
Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.

[ Effect ]
When this Skill is activated, activate "World Dino Wrestling" directly from your Deck. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.

name: Drone Force
desc:
[ Skill Activation ]
Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.

[ Effect ]
When this Skill is activated, make 1 monster your opponent controls lose 200 ATK for each "Drone" card in your GY until the end of this turn, and if you do, 1 "Drone" Link Monster you control gains that lost ATK until the end of this turn. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.

name: Trickstar Gig
desc:
[ Skill Activation ]
Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.

[ Effect ]
When this Skill is activated, send 1 card from the top of your Deck to the GY for each "Trickstar" monster you control, then add 1 "Trickstar" card from your GY to your hand. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.

name: Stalactite Spear
desc:
[ Skill Activation ]
Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.

[ Effect ]
Activate this Skill when an EARTH monster you control destroys an opponent's monster by battle. When this Skill is activated, inflict damage to your opponent equal to 100 x the Level of that monster destroyed by battle with your EARTH monster. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.

name: Shape of Sea
desc:
[ Skill Activation ]
Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.

[ Effect ]
Activate this Skill when you take battle damage. When this Skill is activated, Special Summon 1 WATER monster from your GY with ATK less than or equal to the damage you took. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.

name: Secret Cure
desc:
[ Skill Activation ]
Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.

[ Effect ]
When this Skill is activated, excavate cards from the top of your Deck until you reveal a monster. Add that monster to your hand, then both players gain LP equal to that monster's ATK, also send the remaining excavated cards to the GY. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.

name: Marker's Portal
desc:
[ Skill Activation ]
Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.

[ Effect ]
Activate this Skill while your LP is lower than your original LP. When this Skill is activated, activate 1 Link Spell directly from your Deck. The Link Spell activated by this skill cannot be negated or destroyed by your opponent's card effects. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.

name: Honey Trap
desc:
[ Skill Activation ]
Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.

[ Effect ]
Activate this Skill when you take battle damage from your opponent's direct attack. When this Skill is activated, gain LP equal to the battle damage you took, then Set 1 Trap from outside the Duel. It can be activated this turn.

name: Anti Skill
desc:
[ Skill Activation ]
Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.

[ Effect ]
Activate this Skill when your opponent activates their Skill. When this Skill is activated, negate your opponent's Skill and draw 2 cards. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.
